name: Ultimate Bath Challenge
description:
Are you ready to tap as fast as you can to beat your friends in the Ultimate Bath Challenge. Choose from three characters (Keith, Ginger, or Fred) and enter in the ultimate test of your tapping speed.

- Simple multi-tap game play
- Physics Based Game Mechanics
- Game Center Implemented for Leaderboard
- Local High Score Stored
- Cool Music
- All Content Included! No In-App Purchases!

* Reaching WOE status adds 1 second to the clock!
* Reaching MAX WOE status adds 20 seconds to the clock!
